marker.comment: Anchored, held firm so far, well enough for us to dighy ashore for few hours.
Still anchored, will prob go on to Sines tomorrow (11th)
Fogbound, cant even see the yacht anchored next to us or beach!
flat calm so motored AM, bit of wind-sailed PM, then fog came down.
10kn on beam, just started sailing. been calm all morning
ok till past cap vicente, then N''ly gust F7 on beam, horrible :-(
calm hot little wind. engine. aiming to anc @ faro lagoon
anchored, amazing place, beaches in every direction :-)
in unfinished mairna, bankrupt EU project, no electricity but free!
bombarded by fishing armada, and shot at on 80M trip here
hreat place, cant wait to take day out on georgous beach tomnorrow :-)
no berths, on old bit of pontoon with no cleats and not coonect to shore
FINALLY MADE IT TO GIBRALTAR !!!!!!! :-))))
In Marbella, for night, onwards tonmorrow.
little wind on nose all day, gusted to F5-6 as we came in here.
sailed for whole 30 mins today! in nice but noisy marina. beach tomm :-)
anchored. was forcast F2 today, but blew 30Kn true!
been in marina for few days, on to Mar menor inland sea tomorrow
anchored behind a large rock in beutiful inland sea, great sunset
went over to corner of inland sea to play on beach 2day
anchored in harbour, surrounded by naturists all stripping off on their boats!
Still anchored here, been dinghying ashore etc. prob leave tomm
In marina tonight as bit swell and nothing to shelter behind here
heading for Calpe, but wind and waves got up so cut into here
Anchored in Calpe, CRYSTAL waters, next 2 motorboat full of topless girls :-)
Left for Formentera 4am, weather closed in, anchored in Javea.
made it to Ibiza, anchored off Formentara, bit swelly
great sail here from formentara till the wind died. In marina for night
12hrs, gusting 30knts + on nose, very wet, great anchorage here though
Anchored in a fantastic small bay, snorkling off beach in crystal waters
visited few more nays, been swimming off back of yacht today :-)
amazing cala, sourrounded by caves, seem to be people in some!
Mahon, lots of navel history centuries old, on a small (50' x50') island in bay
still in mahon, weather has changed, unlikly 2 leve 4 italy till tuesday
anchored next to massive fort in mahon, going to look around it tomm
weathr still bad, not going 2 itay, leave olli in minoca 4 winter
